version_description:
• Entire solar system is now visible if you zoom out in game view, it not anything game changing, however I think its pretty cool to be able to for example see the earth from the moon, and just being able to see the scales and distances is sometimes pretty mind blowing.
• New sun texture, it now looks way more beautiful and realistic.
• Fixed a minor terrain loading bug, that on really rare occasionally caused rockets to flip upon loading.

Added: Fairings, Probes, RCS, Solar panels and one new engine [Free].
Increased build space height by 2 [Free].

Added option to get a parts extension with: Docking, Rovers and Big parts, Extra build space
(The extension also includes ALL future parts)

Added clear all debris button.
Added a large number of quality of life changes.
Fixed a large number of bugs.
Made significant improvements to performance.

*Added*
Rocket sharing (It might be buggy for the first few days, will get stable with time).
Electric system.
Ion engine, Big panels, 3 Batteries, RTG, big strut, and 6x2 tank.
Fuel Transfer.
No gravity and Unbreakable parts settings.
New flame effects.
New expansion sale page.

*Fixed*
Directional arrow.
Sandbox settings bug.
Fixed many other small bugs.
